ygData.subject: Re: Angel Prime
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok, stop arguing. Play your bots as normal bots. They can be strong, but not too strong as both you, Johnny, and Prodigey are playing them out to be. Super

Ok, stop arguing. Play your bots as normal bots. They can be strong,
but not too strong as both you, Johnny, and Prodigey are playing them
out to be. Super charges are fine, but it can't make a bot super powerful.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Johnny Brennan" <thejerkyboysare@h...> wrote:
> We don't know the full extent of energon on transmetal 2's now. If
they've 
> been battling for a while their energon systems might be drained. And I 
> never said the energon was make Recon impervious, it's giving him a
super 
> charge since he'll need it, but unfortunately with his systems it'll be 
> burnt out soon.
